original_text: You shall make seven lamps for it. And the lamps shall be set up so as to give light on the space in front of it.
korean_text: 등잔 일곱을 만들어 그 위에 두어 앞을 비추게 하며

sentences.original_text: You shall make seven lamps for it.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 위에 일곱 등불을 만들라.

sentences.original_text: And the lamps shall be set up
to give light on the space in front of it.
